name: Barbie Horse Adventures: Blue Ribbon Race
overview: Join Barbie on horseback and ride through 8 exciting locations in a race to the finish line! It’s the National Horse charity event and you’re invited to ride and compete in exciting events! Race through lush countryside, gallop around rock formations, canter down country roads and more! Use skill and speed to dodge obstacles like rocks, hay bales and forest animals! Run even faster and earn more points with special power-ups! It’s the ultimate horse race for you and Barbie!
